channel.title: Console is Broken / Able to get stuck in Anomalous Materials
channel.description:
[b]First Issue:[/b]
I can not open the console no matter what I do. Changing it in the key bindings does nothing.
I also tried the advice [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/27922-Console-not-opening/?postID=607183#post607183â']listed here[/url], but it only toggles on/off once before being broken again. It also won't let me bind to ~ (tilde) since hitting that key wipes whatever is in the console text field.
Edit: Apparently my game now set it to F8 which seems to work... for now. Still really bizarre.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Second Issue:[/b]
In Anomalous Materials, in the room across the hall from where the g-man is having a little chat with a scientist [url='https://i.imgur.com/omJQ54H.jpgâ']you can hop up on to this TV in the corner[/url] and get stuck behind it.
Wasn't too big of an issue until I realized the console was broken and I couldn't noclip out, lol. Anyway, just thought you might want to idiot-proof that. Cheers

item.title: Console is Broken / Able to get stuck in Anomalous Materials
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Also you can get stuck in the AMS by jumping in it. I can try and get a screenshot of exactly what part when I get home.

Read full topic

item.title: Console is Broken / Able to get stuck in Anomalous Materials
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
First Issue:

I can not open the console no matter what I do. Changing it in the key bindings does nothing.

I also tried the advice listed here, but it only toggles on/off once before being broken again. It also won’t let me bind to ~ (tilde) since hitting that key wipes whatever is in the console text field.

Edit: Apparently my game now set it to F8 which seems to work… for now. Still really bizarre.

Second Issue:

In Anomalous Materials, in the room across the hall from where the g-man is having a little chat with a scientist you can hop up on to this TV in the corner and get stuck behind it.

Wasn’t too big of an issue until I realized the console was broken and I couldn’t noclip out, lol. Anyway, just thought you might want to idiot-proof that. Cheers

Read full topic
